thread.title: Digital Content Assistant - Sports Media

title: Digital Content Assistant - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Digital Content Assistant Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Assist in the production of digital initiatives. Work with other departments, coordinating content and updates to social platforms and web. Participate in digital productions, as assigned. Participate in meetings and conference calls related to productions   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
